register.description: This register logs the different reset sources of the CORE domain. Each bit is set upon release of the domain reset signal. Must be cleared by software.

bitfield.description: Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.
Power domain wake-up reset

bitenum.description: CORE domain has been reset following a CORE power domain wake-up.

bitfield.description: Global warm reset

bitenum.description: CORE domain has been reset upon a global warm reset

bitfield.description: Global cold reset

bitenum.description: CORE domain has been reset upon a global cold reset

register.description: This register allows enabling/disabling modules wake-up events.

bitfield.description: Write 1's for future compatibility. Read returns 1.
MMC SDIO 3 wake-up control
Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.
MMC SDIO 2 wake-up control
MMC SDIO 1 wake-up control
Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.
McSPI 4 wake-up control
McSPI 3 wake-up control
McSPI 2 wake-up control
McSPI 1 wake-up control
I2C 3 wake-up control
I2C 2 wake-up control
I2C 1 wake-up control
UART 2 wake-up control
UART 1 wake-up control
GPTIMER 11 wake-up control
GPTIMER 10 wake-up control
McBSP 5 wake-up control
McBSP 1 wake-up control
Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.
HS OTG USB wake-up control

bitenum.description: HS OTG USB wake-up is disabled
HS OTG USB wake-up event is enabled

bitfield.description: Write 0x8 for future compatibility. Read returns 0x8.

register.description: This register logs module wake-up events. Must be cleared by software. If it is not cleared, it prevents further domain transition.

bitfield.description: Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.
MMC 3 Wake-up status

bitenum.description: MMC 3 wake-up did not occur or was masked.

bitfield.description: Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.
MMC 2 Wake-up status

bitenum.description: MMC 2 wake-up did not occur or was masked.

bitfield.description: MMC 1 Wake-up status

bitenum.description: MMC 1 wake-up did not occur or was masked.

bitfield.description: Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.
McSPI 4 Wake-up status

bitenum.description: McSPI 4 wake-up did not occur or was masked.

bitenum.description: McSPI 3 wake-up did not occur or was masked.

bitenum.description: McSPI 1 wake-up did not occur or was masked.

bitenum.description: I2C 3 wake-up did not occur or was masked.

bitfield.description: I2C 2 Wake-up status

bitenum.description: I2C 2 wake-up did not occur or was masked.

bitfield.description: I2C 1 Wake-up status

bitenum.description: I2C 1 wake-up did not occur or was masked.

bitfield.description: UART 2 Wake-up status

bitenum.description: UART 2 wake-up did not occur or was masked.

bitfield.description: UART 1 Wake-up status

bitenum.description: UART 1 wake-up did not occur or was masked.

bitfield.description: GPTIMER 11 Wake-up status

bitenum.description: GPTIMER 11 wake-up did not occur or was masked.

bitfield.description: GPTIMER 10 Wake-up status

bitenum.description: GPTIMER 10 wake-up did not occur or was masked.

bitfield.description: McBSP 5 Wake-up status

bitenum.description: McBSP 5 wake-up did not occur or was masked.

bitfield.description: McBSP 1 Wake-up status

bitenum.description: McBSP 1 wake-up did not occur or was masked.

bitfield.description: Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.
HS OTG USB Wake-up status

bitenum.description: HS OTG USB wake-up did not occur or was masked.

bitfield.description: Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.

register.description: This register logs module wake-up events. Must be cleared by software. If it is not cleared, it prevents further domain transition.

bitfield.description: Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.
USB TLL wake-up status

bitenum.description: USB TLL wake-up did not occur or was masked.

bitfield.description: Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.

register.description: This register controls the CORE domain power state transition.

bitfield.description: Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.
Memory block 2 state when domain is ON

bitenum.description: Memory block 2 is OFF when domain is ON.
Memory block 2 is in RETENTION when domain is ON.
Memory block 2 is ON when domain is ON.

bitfield.description: Memory block 1 state when domain is ON

bitenum.description: Memory block 1 is OFF when domain is ON.
Memory block 1 is in RETENTION when domain is ON.
Memory block 1 is ON when domain is ON.

bitfield.description: Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.
Memory block 2 state when domain is RETENTION

bitenum.description: Memory block 2 is OFF when domain is in RETENTION state.
Memory block 2 is retained when domain is in RETENTION state.

bitfield.description: Memory block 1 state when domain is RETENTION

bitenum.description: Memory block 1 is OFF when domain is in RETENTION state.
Memory block 1 is retained when domain is in RETENTION state.

bitfield.description: Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.
Save And Restore mechanism for the USB TLL module

bitenum.description: Disable the save and restore mechanism for the USB TLL module
Enable the save and restore mechanism for the USB TLL module

bitfield.description: Memory change control in ON state

bitenum.description: Enable memory change state in ON state. This bit is automaticaly cleared when memory state is effectively changed.

bitfield.description: Logic state when domain is RETENTION

bitenum.description: Logic build with retention flip-flop (SMS, SDRC, control module, clock management) is retained and remaining logic is OFF when domain is in RETENTION state.
Logic is retained when domain is in RETENTION state.

bitfield.description: Power state control

register.description: This register provides a status on the power state transition of the CORE domain.

bitfield.description: Read returns 0.
Domain transition status

bitenum.description: CORE power domain transition is in progress.

bitfield.description: Read returns 0.
Memory block 2 state status
Memory block 1 state status
Read returns 0.
Logic state status
Current power state status

register.description: This register provides a status on the CORE domain previous power state. It indicates the state entered during the last sleep transition.

bitfield.description: Read returns 0.
Last Memory block 2 state entered
Last Memory block 1 state entered
Read returns 0.
Last logic state entered

bitenum.description: CORE domain logic was previously OFF
CORE domain logic was previously ON

bitfield.description: Last power state entered

bitenum.description: CORE domain was previously in RETENTION

register.description: This register allows enabling/disabling modules wake-up events.

bitfield.description: Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.
USB TLL wake-up control

bitenum.description: USB TLL wake-up event is enabled

bitfield.description: Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.

register.description: This register allows selecting the group of modules that wake-up the IVA2.

bitfield.description: Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.

bitenum.description: USB TLL is not attached to the IVA2 wake-up events group.
USB TLL is attached to the IVA2 wake-up events group.

bitfield.description: Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.

register.description: This register allows selecting the group of modules that wake-up the MPU.

bitfield.description: Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.

bitenum.description: USB TLL is not attached to the MPU wake-up events group.
USB TLL is attached to the MPU wake-up events group.

bitfield.description: Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.
